item.title: 保险公司要求爱迪生保存洛杉矶野火证据
item.description: 代表保险公司的律师要求爱迪生国际南加州电力公司保留与洛杉矶致命的伊顿大火有关的证据。【原文：Edison International’s Southern California power utility has been asked by attorneys representing insurance companies to preserve evidence in connection with the deadly Eaton Fire in Los Angeles.】

item.title: 阿波罗掂量 95 亿美元入股 Seven & i Management 收购案
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. is considering taking a substantial stake in a bid by Seven & i’s founding Ito family to take the Japanese convenience store operator private, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 中国恒大关键部门被香港法院下令清盘
item.description: 中国恒大集团（China Evergrande Group）的一家重要离岸子公司被香港法院下令清算，这标志着试图获取这家违约建筑商重要资产的清算人在法律上取得了最新胜利。【原文：A key offshore subsidiary of China Evergrande Group was ordered to liquidate by a Hong Kong court, marking the latest legal win for liquidators who are trying to access the defaulted builder’s key assets.】

item.title: 印度即将公布的预算可能会通过减免个人税促进城市消费
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 中国交易员对全球股票的需求导致罕见 ETF 停摆
item.description: 中国投资者对海外股票的强烈追捧引发了两只追踪全球股市的交易所交易基金罕见地全天停牌。【原文：Chinese investors’ fierce appetite for overseas shares has triggered rare, full-day suspensions on a pair of exchange-traded funds tracking global equities.】

item.title: 英伟达抨击拜登试图用芯片规则 "先发制人 "特朗普
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）批评了预计将很快公布的新芯片出口限制措施，称白宫试图通过在最后一刻实施规则来削弱即将上任的特朗普政府。【原文：Nvidia Corp. criticized new chip export restrictions that are expected to be announced soon, saying the White House was trying to undercut the incoming Trump administration by imposing last-minute rules.】

item.title: 期权定价表明卢比可能进一步走弱
item.description: 卢比将在短期内从历史低点继续下滑，期权市场显示，到 3 月底，卢比很有可能贬值到 87 美元兑 1 美元。【原文：The rupee is set to extend its slide from record lows in the near term, with the options market signaling a significant chance of the currency weakening to 87 per dollar by the end of March.】

item.title: 澳元交易员加大看跌押注，2022 年低点在望
item.description: 随着经济数据疲软和美国增加关税的可能性增大，交易商越来越多地认为澳元将跌至 2020 年的水平。【原文：Traders are increasingly positioning for the Australian dollar to fall to levels last seen in 2020 as economic data weaken and increased US tariffs look more likely.】

item.title: 印度 Infosys 和 HCL 将探讨特朗普上台后的商业前景
item.description: 印度 IT 外包巨头 Infosys Ltd.、HCL Technologies Ltd. 和 Wipro Ltd. 的股价因唐纳德-特朗普赢得美国大选而得到提振。它们将在发布财报时有机会就特朗普当选总统可能对其业务产生的影响发表评论。【原文：Shares of Indian IT outsourcing giants Infosys Ltd., HCL Technologies Ltd. and Wipro Ltd. got a boost from Donald Trump’s US election win. They will get a chance to comment on how his presidency might affect their businesses when they post earnings.】

item.title: 紫金矿业洽谈以 60 亿美元收购中国锂生产商
item.description: 中国最具收购能力的矿业公司之一紫金矿业集团股份有限公司称，该公司正在讨论收购藏格矿业股份有限公司（Zangge Mining Co.该公司是一家锂和钾肥生产商。【原文：Zijin Mining Group Co., one of China’s most acquisitive miners, says it’s in discussions to buy shares and potentially to take over Zangge Mining Co. Ltd. a lithium and potash producer.】

item.title: 受特朗普打击的菲律宾股市有望因支出和利润反弹
item.description: 自唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得大选以来，菲律宾股市在创下亚洲最大跌幅之后，有望迎来转机，国内支出的增加有望提振盈利。【原文：Philippine equities are poised for a turnaround after notching the steepest drop in Asia since Donald Trump’s election win, with higher domestic spending expected to boost earnings.】

item.title: 格拉斯-刘易斯在空气产品公司董事会之争中支持曼特尔-里奇
item.description: 代理顾问Glass Lewis & Co.表示，空气化工产品公司（Air Products and Chemicals Inc.【原文：Air Products and Chemicals Inc. shareholders should vote for dissident board candidates nominated by activist investor Mantle Ridge, said proxy adviser Glass Lewis & Co.】

item.title: 中国人民银行称将暂时停止购买政府债券
item.description: 在基准收益率本月跌至历史新低后，中国央行表示将暂时停止购买政府债券。【原文：China’s central bank said it will temporarily halt its buying of government bonds, after the benchmark yield slid to a record low this month.】

item.title: 英伟达合作使联发科股价屡创新高
item.description: 与英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）合作的加强将投资者对联发科公司人工智能增长潜力的乐观情绪推向了一个新的高度，使其股价有望在七个月内首次创下历史新高。【原文：Increased collaboration with Nvidia Corp. has pushed investor optimism over the AI growth potential for MediaTek Inc. to a new level, putting its shares on track for their first record high in seven months.】

item.title: 贝莱德正在洽谈出售 Sperry 旗下 Authentic Brands 集团的股份
item.description: 据知情人士透露，包括 CVC Capital Partners、General Atlantic、HPS Investment Partners 和 Leonard Green & Partners 在内的一个投资集团正在洽谈收购贝莱德公司持有的 Authentic Brands Group 股权。【原文：An investor group including CVC Capital Partners, General Atlantic, HPS Investment Partners and Leonard Green & Partners is in talks to buy BlackRock Inc.’s equity stake in Authentic Brands Group, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 黄金连涨三日后保持稳定，美国非农就业受关注
item.description: 黄金在连续三日上涨后趋于稳定，交易商在等待美国就业数据的公布，这些数据将有助于确定美联储今年的政策前景。【原文：Gold steadied after a three-day advance as traders waited for the release of US payrolls figures that’ll help to shape the outlook for Federal Reserve policy this year.】

item.title: 交易员缩减降息赌注，中国掉期曲线内敛
item.description: 中国的货币市场押注政府将推迟预期中的货币宽松措施，以支持受困的人民币。【原文：China’s money markets are betting the authorities will delay their anticipated monetary easing measures in order to support the beleaguered yuan.】

item.title: 墨西哥城棒球队 Diablos Rojos 希望在股票上市后筹集资金
item.description: 墨西哥城棒球队 Diablos Rojos de Mexico 主席在公司于当地交易所首次上市后表示，公司正计划进行后续发行以筹集资金。【原文：Mexico City baseball team Diablos Rojos de Mexico is planning a follow-on offering to raise capital, its chairman said after the company’s market debut in the local exchange.】

item.title: 澳大利亚人口最多的州从 2027 年起将面临天然气短缺问题
item.description: 据澳大利亚最高消费者监督机构称，除非新的天然气田尽快投产，否则预计从 2027 年开始，澳大利亚东海岸的国内天然气供应将出现短缺。【原文：Australia’s east coast is expected to have a shortfall of domestic gas supply from 2027 unless new gas fields are soon brought online, according to the nation’s top consumer watchdog.】

item.title: 印度基础设施贷款机构计划筹资高达 47 亿美元
item.description: 印度国有的国家基础设施建设融资银行（National Bank for Financing Infrastructure & Development）计划在 1 月至 3 月期间进行有史以来最大规模的筹资，以支持印度雄心勃勃的经济增长。【原文：India’s state-owned National Bank for Financing Infrastructure & Development is targeting its largest ever fundraising for the January-March period to back the nation’s ambitious growth push.】

item.title: 美国 12 月就业报告有望展示健康的劳动力市场
item.description: 12 月份，美国雇主可能增加了大量工作岗位，失业率保持不变，这表明劳动力市场在过去一年里没有出现大幅放缓的预期。【原文：US employers likely added a healthy number of jobs in December and the unemployment rate was unchanged, showcasing a labor market that for another year defied expectations for a sharper slowdown.】

item.title: 日本家庭支出下降，影响日本央行加息路径
item.description: 日本家庭连续第四个月减少消费，因为通胀继续拖累他们的购买力，这显示出经济的脆弱性，可能会使日本央行对进一步加息保持谨慎。【原文：Japan’s households cut consumption for a fourth month as inflation continues to weigh on their purchasing power, showing an economic fragility that’s likely to keep the Bank of Japan cautious about additional rate hikes.】

item.title: 库存下降压倒中国担忧，石油涨势扩大
item.description: 由于美国库存下降抵消了最大进口国中国经济疲软的更多迹象，石油连续第二天上涨。【原文：Oil rose for a second day as falling US inventories offset more signs of economic weakness in China, the biggest importer.】

item.title: 印度消费差距扩大，富人大肆挥霍，中产阶级缩减开支
item.description: 当印度 1 亿最富有的人在婚礼、珠宝和高档公寓上挥金如土时，他们的 4 亿多中产阶级同胞却在减少食用油、肥皂和饼干等消费品的购买。【原文：While India’s 100 million wealthiest people are splurging on weddings, jewelry, and top-end apartments, over 400 million of their middle-class compatriots are cutting back on the purchases of consumables like cooking oil, soaps, and biscuits.】

item.title: 美国就业报告临近，日元干预风险走高
item.description: 周五晚些时候公布的美国就业报告有可能成为日元大幅波动的催化剂，交易员们正警惕日本采取干预措施支持日元的风险上升。【原文：Traders are on alert for a rising risk of Japan intervening to support the yen, with a US jobs report later Friday looming as a potential catalyst for sharp moves in the currency.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚连续第四年超额完成通胀目标
item.description: 哥伦比亚 12 月份的通货膨胀率超出预期，连续第四年超过中央银行的目标范围。【原文：Colombian inflation exceeded expectations in December, overshooting the central bank’s target range for a fourth straight year.】

item.title: 秘鲁降低利率，决策者认为通胀已得到控制
item.description: 秘鲁是新兴市场中通胀率最低的国家之一，在通胀率进一步下降之后，秘鲁重启了宽松货币政策。【原文：Peru restarted monetary easing after one of the lowest inflation rates in emerging markets fell even further.】

item.title: 德克萨斯州炼油厂准备迎接首场冬季风暴和寒冷的一月份
item.description: 随着美国南部第一场大的冬季风暴席卷而来，德克萨斯州的炼油厂正准备迎接寒冷、降雪和冻雨的袭击，预计这将是一个寒冷的月份。【原文：Texas refineries are bracing for an onslaught of cold, snow and freezing rain as the US South’s first major winter storm sweeps in during what’s projected to be a frigid month.】

item.title: 奥特曼玩具制造商 Bloks 首次公开募股后将在香港上市
item.description: 备受欢迎的中国奥特曼和变形金刚公仔制造商 Bloks Group Ltd. 的股票将于周五在香港开始交易，此前该公司首次公开募股募集了 2.15 亿美元，吸引了大量个人投资者。【原文：Shares of Bloks Group Ltd., the popular Chinese maker of Ultraman and Transformers figurines, will begin trading in Hong Kong on Friday after its $215 million initial public offering drew overwhelming demand from individual investors.】

item.title: 随着就职日的临近，加密货币首席执行官们纷纷要求接触特朗普
item.description: Circle 公司首席执行官杰里米-阿莱尔（Jeremy Allaire）周四在 X 上表示，这家稳定币公司向当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的就职委员会捐赠了价值 100 万美元的代币— 在即将上任的政府致力于组建一个重要的加密货币行业组织之际，该公司加入了其他首席执行官争宠的行列。【原文：Circle Chief Executive Officer Jeremy Allaire said Thursday on X that the stablecoin company contributed tokens worth $1 million to President-elect Donald Trump’s inaugural committee — joining a parade of other CEOs vying for favor as the incoming administration works to form a key crypto industry group.】
